sentences.en: A diet lacking in nutritional value will not keep a person healthy.
sentences.cn: 缺乏营养价值的饮食不能维持人的健康.

sentences.en: Animals became a valuable source of mechanical as well as nutritional energy.
sentences.cn: 动物成为一种有价值的机械和营养能的来源.

sentences.en: As a result , the nutritional status of the children is good overall.
sentences.cn: 在院儿童的营养状况普遍良好.

sentences.en: Cooking vegetables for too long lessens their nutritional value.
sentences.cn: 烹饪蔬菜时间过长有损其营养价值。

sentences.en: Cooking vegetables reduces their nutritional value.
sentences.cn: 烹饪蔬菜会降低其营养价值。

sentences.en: It does sometimes help to know the nutritional content of foods.
sentences.cn: 知道食物所含的营养成分有时的确有帮助。

sentences.en: The basic nutritional principles which originally led to their successful development are neglected.
sentences.cn: 作为指导它成功发展的基本营养学原理也就无从谈起了.

sentences.en: The grower is no longer in full control of the nutritional situation.
sentences.cn: 栽培者就再也不能完全控制营养状况.

sentences.en: The labels on food products give a lot of information about their nutritional content.
sentences.cn: 食品上的标签提供很多关于营养成分的信息.

sentences.en: The nature of the nutritional requirements for obligate parasites in nature is unknown.
sentences.cn: 人们还不知道自然界中专性寄生菌的营养要求的本质.

sentences.en: the nutritional requirements of pregnant women
The typical patient has obvious signs of advanced nutritional cirrhosis.
sentences.cn: 典型的病人有明显的晚期营养性肝硬变的体症.

sentences.en: These disease burdens are difficult to quantify in nutritional terms.
sentences.cn: 这些病患所造成的负担很难从营养角度去加以衡量.

sentences.en: They see chocolate as a fattening food that lacks nutritional value.
sentences.cn: 他们视巧克力为会使人增胖而不具营养价值的食物.

sentences.en: We need human capital if we are to meet our nutritional needs.
sentences.cn: 如果我们想解决食品问题,就需要人力资本.

sentences.en: We need to revitalize human nutritional research.
sentences.cn: 我们需要振兴人类营养学研究.

sentences.en: When you sprout seeds their nutritional content increases.
sentences.cn: 让种子发芽后，其营养含量会提高。

words.tran_cn: 有营养的；滋养的；有营养成份的；与营养有关的
营养物；促进生长的东西

phrases.tran_cn: 营养补充品；营养增补剂

trans.tran_cn: 营养的，滋养的，营养品的
trans.tran_en: relating to the substances in food that help you to stay healthy
